AuthCallback.title: Authentication completed
AuthCallback.text: You will now be redirected to our application.

AuthenticatingComponent.title: Authenticating
AuthenticatingComponent.text: You will be redirected to the login page.

dialog_create_conference.enter_moderator_id: Enter the id of the user to add to moderators

common.disable_room_chat_master: Disable room chat for master room
common.show_participants_typing: Show participants that are currently typing below chat
common.hide_participants_without_webcam: Don't show participants without active webcam
common.overlay_scene: Overlay scene with webcam if necessary

conference_not_open.play_sound_on_conference_open: Play a sound when the conference opens
conference_not_open.you_are_moderator: You are a moderator of this conference.
conference_not_open.waiting_for_moderator_to_join: Conference is not yet open. Waiting for moderator to join...
conference_not_open.waiting_for_moderator_to_open: Conference is not yet open. Waiting for moderator to open this conference...
conference_not_open.you_dont_need_to_refresh: You don't need to refresh this page

request_user_interaction.title: Please do something
request_user_interaction.request: Click anywhere | Press any key | Tap anywhere
request_user_interaction.description: We cannot play audio until you have interacted with the website due to your browser's autoplay policy.

notifications.device_disconnected_local: The local device for source {{name}} was disconnected, fall back to default device.
notifications.device_disconnected_equipment: The equipment device for source {{name}} was disconnected, fall back to default device.

dialog_permissions.title: Permissions of {{name}}
dialog_permissions.description: Here you can inspect the exact permissions and where they come from. A permission consists of a key and a value that maybe used all over the application. The permissions are grouped in layers, depending of the status of the participant there may be different layers. Layers at the top overwrite permissions defined at the bottom if with the same key. The default values are false.

common.strive_creator: Strive was created by Vincent Griebel.

audio.title: Audio
audio.test_description: We will loopback your current audio input and show the results here. This way, you can check what other participants actually receive.
audio.repeat_audio_description: Click the button below and say something. Click it again and we will replay what you just said.
audio.something_to_say_text: Strive is much better than other video conference systems
audio.permission_denied: Permission denied: Please allow the use of your microphone in your browser

webcam.title: Webcam
webcam.test_description: We will loopback your current webcam input over the server and show the results here. This way, you can check what other participants actually receive and you also get a taste of the actual delay.
webcam.permission_denied: Permission denied: Please allow the use of your webcam in your browser

screen.title: Screen
screen.error_no_devices: Your screen was not found. Sadly, some browsers still do not support sharing the screen, like most of the mobile browsers. You can connect equipment and share it's screen.

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.description: Don't have a webcam but have a smartphone with a camera? Don't have a good microphone but a tablet that has one? No problem, you can use multiple external devices as your microphone or webcam or share their screen.
equipment.error_fetch_token: An error occurred when trying to fetch the equipment token: {{error, error}}
equipment.step_1: 1. Scan the QR code or manually open this url on your device:
equipment.step_3: 3. Change the default device here in settings

diagnostics.title: Diagnostics
diagnostics.refresh_notice: Please note: you may have to refresh this page in order to apply the changes

settings.webrtc_not_connected_error: WebRTC not connected, so you cannot test your audio device. Please refresh the page or contact the server administrator.

scenes.autonomous_description: Automatically select the current scene. You can change the behavior in conference settings.

talking_stick_modes.queue_description: Participants can enqueue. If it's a participants turn, he becomes the presenter until he returns the stick. If the queue is not empty, the next participant will automatically be selected.
talking_stick_modes.race_description: The first person to take the stick becomes the presenter. After he returns the stick, anyone can take it again.
talking_stick_modes.moderated_description: Participants can join a list. The moderators can select participants from the list who then become the presenter.
talking_stick_modes.speakerPassStick_description: Participants can join a list. The first participant becomes the presenter and can then choose the next one from the list.
talking_stick_modes.add_to_list_status: One other wants to say something
talking_stick_modes.remove_from_list: I don't want to say something

dialog_breakout_rooms.validation_must_create_at_least_one: Must at least create one breakout room.
dialog_breakout_rooms.validation_must_at_least_one_minute: Must at least give one minute.
dialog_breakout_rooms.description_description: Optionally define the task the participants should do.
dialog_breakout_rooms.create_description: Let participants work together in smaller groups. Here you can define the amount of rooms to create. You can assign a duration for the breakout phase, it will be displayed to all participants. After creation the participants can join them on their own.
dialog_breakout_rooms.update_description: Here you can update the current state of the breakout rooms.

connecting.desc: Trying to connect to WebRTC server (selective forwarding unit). Please make sure that the SFU was started and is reachable.

send_transport_missing.desc: The send transport was not created. Please refresh this page and if you continue to have this error, please contact the support.

send_transport_connecting.desc: WebRTC is currently trying to connect the send transport, please stand by.

new.desc: The connection was created and initialized, but not yet established.

invalid_connection_state.desc: The WebRTC connection seems to have problems. Please check your browser or refresh this page.

speakers.title: Speakers
speakers.desc: To check if your speakers are working, please play the test sound. If you cannot hear anything while the sound is playing, please check your sound output in the settings of your operating system.

request_permissions.title: Use this device as equipment
request_permissions.error: Please accept the permission request for media.

chat.error_fetch_chat: An error occurred when trying to fetch the chat: {{error, error}}
